short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The missing Web UI for Elasticsearch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[Deprecated: New version updates available on the chrome extension - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/dejavu/jopjeaiilkcibeohjdmejhoifenbnmlh]

dejavu is a modern, open-source data browser for Elasticsearch that comes with powerful visual data filters, infinite data scrolling support and realtime data updates. It focuses on one thing only - displaying your ES index data and does it better than existing browsers, which are either built with a legacy UI or leave much to desire in their Ux.

dejavu uses 100% browser javascript and is written with React v0.14.7. In addition to this chrome extension, it's also available as an Elasticsearch plugin and as a hosted website at https://appbaseio.github.io/dejaVu.

You can read about how it compares to existing solutions here - https://github.com/appbaseio/dejaVu#comparison-with-other-data-browsers.
